rewrite1:
Please make the following formatting changes to the document:

In the fifth paragraph:
- Set the line spacing to Single.
- Clear any text that is in bold.
- Align the text to the right.
- Change the font size to 16 points.

In the tenth paragraph:
- Add a 0.5 line space before the paragraph begins.
- Set the spacing after the paragraph to the equivalent of 3 lines.
- Reduce the font size to 48 points.
- Apply a highlight color with the hex code #0000FF.

- For the tenth paragraph, insert a space of half a line before the text begins. After the paragraph, leave a space equivalent to 3 lines. Reduce the font size significantly to 48 points, and apply a highlight with the color corresponding to hex code #0000FF.
